select count(1) from inject_tv_priority where 1=1
and channelCode=#{channelCode}

select a.id,a.channelCode,a.priority,a.updatetime,a.modifier,b.channelName from inject_tv_priority a left join vod_tv_channel b on a.channelCode=b.channelCode where 1=1
and a.channelCode=#{channelCode}
select a.id,a.channelCode,a.priority,a.updatetime,a.modifier,b.channelName from inject_tv_priority a left join vod_tv_channel b on a.channelCode=b.channelCode where 1=1 and a.id=#{id}
select a.channelCode,b.channelName from inject_tv_priority a left join vod_tv_channel b on a.channelCode=b.channelCode
select a.channelCode,a.channelName from vod_tv_channel a where not EXISTS (select 1 from inject_tv_priority b where a.channelCode=b.channelCode)
